nodes.bodyText: Should we keep this? It would make things more consistent as all ores have a tag under forge namespace, but it's also just a copy of the vanilla tag
I am not sure as well, I just think it is just a tad easier, avoids having to add to a minecraft tag only for gold ore.

We should keep all of our tags. Having ours extend from vanilla's by default.
It keeps things organized, and it makes things not just dissapear in the middle of a MC version.
We could possibly make it deprecated. But honestly it's a data object it doesn't really matter how long we keep it.
Same here, it shouldn't just dissapear, if we want to remove it, mark it for removal in 1.16.2.
All of these are binary breaks, so no.
